name: The Other Adventurer
description:
The Other Adventurer

By: Barry Rowe

Made at TOJam 12!

Version 1.1

=================

INSTRUCTIONS:

-------------

Arrow Keys: Movement

Space: Sword attack

Ctrl: Fire bow (when obtained)

Tab: Toggle minimap

M: Toggle music

SAVE/LOAD

---------

Move down from the start map to get the menu map

where you can save and load your game.

CHANGE LOG:

-------------

Version 1.1

-added music

-fixed sword attack bug

-added chests

-fixed side wall graphics

-fixed resolution setting

Version 1.0

-Original TOJam release
